overview: Fernando Sancho is a Professor of Computer Science and the Universidad de Sevilla (Spain), where he conducts research on mathematics, complex systems, and cellular computation with membranes. He is associated with The CulturePlex, the lab for the study of cultural complexity and digital humanities at the University of Western Ontario (Canada). Fernando Sancho is a Co-Founder of Yutzu (www.yutzu.com), space for creative minds that helps collect content, collaborate with teammates, and communicate with people everywhere.
